title: test en
mission_paragraph: Making life easier for students and teachers with distance school in the context of the current pandemic with an online exam platform adapted to different school needs.
newsletter_paragraph: Sign up to be notified of our launch.
description_paragraphe: Quick Exams is a software suite that brings together everything you need to make your life easier with remote mode exams.
whatToInstall: You can download and install the entire suite or install just the add-ons you really need.
our_team_paragraph: Our experienced developers are committed to providing you with a modern, clean and easy-to-use platform.
our_story_paragraph: It all started with an end-of-university project when the pandemic was only in its infancy and the platforms were poorly adapted.
our_specs_paragraph: Listen to your need and offering a turnkey platform for all your assessment needs.
toKnowEverything_paragraph: For information or establish a partnership, contact us by email.
